item.title: Diablo 4’s Next Expansion Can’t Miss the Same Opportunity Vessel of Hatred Did
item.description:
Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred went a long way to expand upon the base game in some much-needed ways well over a year after its initial launch. Additions like the Kurast Undercity dungeon and the multiplayer-focused Dark Citadel gave Diablo 4 's endgame loop a shot in the arm for players burnt out on the base game's endgame offerings. However, Vessel of Hatred still left the game lacking in one department that seemed primed to be a core part of Diablo 4 's challenge in the lead-up to and at launch.

The multiplayer side of Diablo 4 has been really hit-or-miss, with Blizzard reporting that most Diablo 4 players are playing the game solo. While the game includes multiplayer activities like the PvP Fields of Hatred and the new Dark Citadel complete with a party finder function, these features are still largely underutilized compared to the single-player content available. Arguably the most popular co-op activity is Diablo 4 's World Boss raids, which makes the lack of a new world boss in Vessel of Hatred all the more surprising and an important addition for the next expansion to consider.

Diablo 4 Hasn't Had a New World Boss Since Launch

Current World Bosses in Diablo 4

  • Ashava the Pestilent
  • Avarice, the Gold Cursed
  • Wandering Death, Death Given Life

Prior to launch, the greatest challenge of the Diablo 4 beta was Ashava the Pestilent, the World Boss that players could slay in order to earn special rewards when the full game launched. This incentive gave groups of players a great reason to team up and take down the raid boss whenever she spawned in Sanctuary. At launch, two more World Bosses became available on a rotating basis, and along with Ashava, Avarice and Wandering Death could be encountered at predetermined intervals around Diablo 4 's map.

However, over a year has passed since Diablo 4 's launch and these three world bosses remain the only ones in the game. With Vessel of Hatred adding the new region of Nahantu to the map, it would have been the perfect opportunity to add another World Boss with the potential to spawn in this region and give players an even greater reason to group up in the DLC. However, the opportunity for this addition has passed for now, with the next most likely chance for Diablo 4 to introduce a new World Boss coming whenever the next expansion is released.

Diablo 4's Next Expansion Should Add a New World Boss

Although it is likely still a ways off, the next Diablo 4 expansion has a clear direction to take the game after the ending of Vessel of Hatred leaves the fate of the Church of Light and Mephisto up in the air. With Vessel of Hatred filling in the remaining area of Diablo 4 's current world map, it stands to reason that the next expansion could take players to a new continent within Sanctuary to places like Khanduras or Westmarch. If this is the case, it would make a lot of sense for this new location to feature one or even several new World Bosses exclusive to the region.

Vessel of Hatred's Dark Citadel goes a long way toward reviving the ailing multiplayer side of Diablo 4 , but it doesn't quite recapture the same level of cooperative effort that existed during raids against Ashava during the open beta. With World Bosses being one of the easiest cooperative activities to participate in, only requiring players to travel to the location of the boss' spawn to join the fight, going all-in on this activity would be the best way to get players engaged with the game's multiplayer. Revitalizing the World Boss system with new raid bosses in the next major expansion could be just what Diablo 4 needs to bring burnt-out players looking for a solid co-op experience back into the fold.

item.title: Roblox: War Tycoon Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
War Tycoon is a Roblox game in which players have to develop their military base. The main way to earn money is oil extractors, which make money over time, so it is necessary to build as many of them as possible. In the beginning, players will have no money at all, but they can use War Tycoon codes and get a good boost. After activating the codes, there will be enough money to build a bunch of oil extractors that will quickly replenish Roblox players' finances.

Updated December 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: There aren’t any codes to redeem right now, but we’ll add them here as soon as they’re released. Be sure to visit this page regularly.

All War Tycoon Codes

Active War Tycoon Codes

  • No active codes.

All Expired War Tycoon Codes

  • Wiki200k - Enter this code to get Magmaflow skin
  • Mega - Enter this code to get Mystic Gun Skin, 100,000 cash and 10 medals
  • Boom - Enter this code to get Verdant Gun Skin
  • BlueTweet - Enter this code to get Sapphire Gun Skin
  • bug spray - Enter this code to get 25 Medals
  • Social - Enter this code to get 100,000 cash and 10 minutes of 2x cash boost
  • Half Mil - Enter this code to get 55 Medals and 550k Cash
  • Victory450k - Enter this code to get 10 Medals, 45,000 cash, and 45 minutes 2x cash boost
  • 350K - Enter this code to get 35,000 cash, 1 life Barrett M82 gamepads gun, and 35 minutes 2x cash boost
  • 250K - Enter this code to get 25,000 cash
  • 200K - Enter this code to get 200,000 cash 1 life Barrett M82 gamepads gun, and 20 minutes 2x cash boost
  • Airforce - Enter this code to get 10 Medals
  • BlueBird - Enter this code to get MP5 Twitter Edition rifle
  • Stonks - Enter this code to get 10 minutes 2x cash boost
  • Hooray50K - Enter this code to get 50,000 cash
  • 50M - Enter this code to get 50 minutes 2x cash boost
  • BigBucks - Enter this code to get 100,000 cash
  • Weekend - Enter this code to get 250,000 cash, a FAL Heavy, and 30 minutes 2x cash boost
  • TweetUp - Enter this code to get 100,000 cash
  • GoinUp - Enter this code to get 2x cash boost

How to Redeem Codes in War Tycoon

Redeeming codes in War Tycoon is just as easy as in most other Roblox games. To complete this, players just need to find a special button, and if they struggle with this, they can use the instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch War Tycoon .
  • There are 5 buttons on the right side of the screen. Click on the blue Codes button.
  • In the Enter Code Here field, enter or paste the code.
  • Click Redeem to get the rewards.

How to Get More War Tycoon Codes

Players can find more codes on the official War Tycoon Twitter account. Also, this article is updated regularly, so players should visit it regularly to get more freebies.

item.title: Pocket Dream Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Pocket Dream Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Pocket Dream
  • How to Get More Pocket Dream Codes

Pocket Dream is a mobile game created for fans of the Pokemon universe. Choose one of the three classic Pokemon and dive into fun adventures as a trainer. You'll find lots of cool battles, an interesting storyline, and of course, a variety of Pokemon you can catch and add to your collection.

In free mobile games, the enemies get harder over time, and it can be difficult to progress through the story without premium currency. Fortunately, you can redeem Pocket Dream codes and get good rewards for free.

Updated December 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've found one new code, so hurry up and redeem it to get your rewards. Check back in a while for more.

All Pocket Dream Codes

Working Pocket Dream Codes

  • 1202HBM - Enter this code to get Diamonds and Diamond Coupons. ( Redeem by December 9th, 2024) (NEW)
  • POCKETDREAM - Enter this code to get x300 Diamond and x10 Diamond Coupon. (Redeem by January 31st, 2025)
  • POKEMON777 - Enter this code to get x10 SSR Poke-Shd Rnd Box. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • POKEMON666 - Enter this code to get x2 Diamond Coupon. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • POKEMON - Enter this code to get x200 Diamond. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • VIP666 - Enter this code to get x100 Diamond and x10 Diamond Coupon. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • VIP777 - Enter this code to get 10K Gold. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • VIP888 - Enter this code to get x10 1Stone Keystone. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)
  • FBFOLLOW - Enter this code to get x10 Diamond Coupon. (Redeem by May 31st, 2025)

Expired Pocket Dream Codes

There are no expired codes in Pocket Dream yet. All codes are active, and you can get rewards for them.

How to Redeem Codes in Pocket Dream

Codes in mobile games are more difficult to redeem than in Roblox , but the average player shouldn't have any problems with it. In Pocket Dream , you just need to complete the tutorial and go to the profile settings. If you still need a hint, you can use our guide below where we explain how to redeem codes in Pocket Dream .

  • Launch Pocket Dream and complete the tutorial if you are a beginner.
  • In the main menu, look at the upper-left corner of the screen. Click on your profile picture.
  • In the Player's information window in the lower-right corner, click the Gift Pack button.
  • Next, paste the code from the list of working codes into the field and click OK.

The code must be active to receive rewards. So redeem it as soon as possible before it expires.

How to Get More Pocket Dream Codes

If you want to receive regular information about new working codes for this free mobile game, you should pin this guide to your browser. To do this, use the key combination Ctrl + D.

Pocket Dream is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Potato Hero Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Potato Hero is an exciting game where you and a small team will fight zombies. During the battles, you will level up andm for that, you will be able to choose new abilities or improvements for yourself and other team members. You need to choose wisely because there are different types of zombies in the game, so you need to adjust your build accordingly. It is also important to improve your equipment before the battle and choose the weapon that will best cope with the challenges of certain levels. For fast progression, you will need a lot of different items and game currency, and fortunately, you can get them for free if you redeem Potato Hero codes.

Updated December 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Redeeming codes is one of the easiest ways to get ahead in your game. This guide is here to make it even easier.

All Potato Hero Codes

Working Potato Hero Codes

  • POTATOCOOL - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards. (NEW)
  • POTATO258 - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards. (NEW)
  • PTZSFIGHT - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • PTZSTGS - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • PTZSLETSGO - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • PTZS2024 - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • PotatoWOW - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • Potato24 - Enter this code to get Diamonds and other rewards.
  • PotatoTOP - Enter this code to get 300 Diamond, 1 Advanced Key, 1 Clothing Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Helmet Enhancement Blueprint, 3 Necklace Enhancement Blueprint, and 5,000 Banknote.
  • PHZS24 - Enter this code to get 300 Diamond, 1 Advanced Key, 3 Clothing Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Shoes Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Glove Enhancement Blueprint, and 5,000 Banknote.
  • PotatoGo - Enter this code to get 300 Diamond, 1 Advanced Key, 1 Clothing Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Shoes Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Necklace Enhancement Blueprint, 1 Weapon Enhancement Blueprint, and 5,000 Banknote.
  • VIP8888 - Enter this code to get 100 Diamond and 3 Resurrection Coins.
  • VIP7777 - Enter this code to get 100 Diamond and 20 Hero Energy Drink.
  • zombie777 - Enter this code to get 100 Diamond and 2 Basic Key.

Expired Potato Hero Codes

So far, Potato Hero has no expired codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Potato Hero

Mobile and Roblox games often have an option to redeem codes. However, mobile games sometimes have restrictions that make the process much more difficult. If you have been playing Potato Hero for a long time, you will be able to redeem codes in a few taps, but it will be much more difficult for beginners. To unlock the code redemption feature, you need to complete five levels. They are quite difficult, so it may take you several hours to complete. To help confused players, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Potato Hero .

  • Open Potato Hero and play until you complete Chapter 5.
  • Click on your profile picture. It is located in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • Select the Redeem Code option.
  • In the white box, paste the code from the list of valid codes and click Submit.

How to Get More Potato Hero Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, if you want to receive new working codes regularly, then you should bookmark this guide in your browser. We update it regularly to make sure you get all the rewards.

Potato Hero is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Cultivation RNG Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Cultivation RNG is a Roblox game in which you will do rolls to get auras. It is quite difficult to get a rare one, so you will have to spend many hours in front of the monitor or spend Robux. Luckily, you can also earn Spirit Stones and buy potions to increase your luck in the game. You can even get them for free if you redeem Cultivation RNG codes.

Updated December 5, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Newly released codes have been added to our list. Take a moment to redeem them and enjoy extra perks. By using them, you will get a huge amount of Spirit Stones, Stats Rerolls, as well as some Luck Potions. And if you need more freebies in the future, make sure to check this guide later.

All Cultivation RNG Codes

Working Cultivation RNG Codes

  • XenGod - Enter this code to get 100,000 Spirit Stones, 1 Stat Reroll, and Heavenly Luck Potion. (NEW)
  • VoixyBlessing - Enter this code to get 100,000,000 Spirit Stones, 1 Stat Reroll, and Heavenly Luck Potion. (NEW)
  • PheonixTalon - Enter this code to get 1,500,000 Spirit Stones and 5 Heavenly Luck Potions
  • JadeTreasure - Enter this code to get 1,500,000 Spirit Stones,15 stat rolls, and 10 Heavenly Luck Potions
  • DragonSoul - Enter this code to get 1,500,000 Spirit Stones, x5 Heavenly Potion, x5 Medium Potion, x10 Regular Potion, and x15 Inferior Potion.
  • BundleOfStuff - Enter this code to get 1,000,000 Spirit Stones, x5 Heavenly Luck Potion, x15 Inferior Luck Potion, x20 Regular Luck Potion, and x5 Medium Luck Potion.

Expired Cultivation RNG Codes

Cultivation RNG has no expired codes at this time. All codes are active and you can redeem them.

How to Redeem Codes in Cultivation RNG

The redemption feature can be found in many Roblox games. The developers try to make it available to players so that they stay in the game as long as possible. Often, this option can be found in the store or in settings. However, it can be confusing for beginners, especially if they have not played similar games. That is why we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Cultivation RNG :

  • Open Roblox and launch Cultivation RNG .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Click the gear button to go to the settings.
  • At the bottom of the settings window, there is a white box, paste the code from the list of working codes into it and click Confirm.

Keep in mind that codes in Cultivation RNG can quickly expire, and you will not be able to receive rewards. Therefore, we recommend redeeming them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Cultivation RNG Codes

One of the best ways to find working Roblox codes is to use guides like this one. We update it regularly so that you can be among the first to redeem codes and get rewarded. If you're interested in the official sources of information from the developers of Cultivation RNG , we recommend that you check out the following pages:

  • Cultivation RNG Discord server
  • Cultivation RNG Roblox group
